dict.acceptation: 恢复；重新获得；找回；<正>恢复（适当的状态或位置）；

sent.orig: Don't worry. The patient will soon recover.
sent.trans: 你别愁，病人很快会好的。

sent.orig: They prayed that she would recover.
sent.trans: 他们为她尽快康复而祈祷。

sent.orig: Conclusion A greater part of atelectatic cases get a quick recover via the fiberbronchoscopic therapy.
sent.trans: 结论胸外伤后肺不张产生的机制是多种多样的，及早行纤维支气管镜检查可明确肺不张的形成原因。

sent.orig: He says young athletes can fully recover from concussion and continue sports activities.
sent.trans: 他指出运动员可以从脑震荡中完全恢复，继续体育运动。

sent.orig: Or that housing must recover for the all-clear signal to sound.
sent.trans: 或者是房屋市场必须复苏，解除警报的信号才会响起。
